page.title: 05BIGGAR TO EDINBURGH
page.content:
{ BIGGAR TO EDINBURGH.}
Coming from Biggar to Edinburgh is a great diffrence. There is a diffrence in the roads.The roads out in Biggar are red and stony and in Edinburgh the roads are black and smooth. The school in Biggar has a more modern kind of classroom.In Edinburgh for example the windows in Edinburgh are very large and the kind in Biggar are the kind you would get in a Wimpey house.Biggar is a small old town in the south of Edinburgh.The nearest shop in Biggar is about 5 miles away but in Edinburgh the shops are about 5 minutes away.The roads in Edinburgh are very busy and noisy and the roads in Biggar are very quiet.
